Question: What is the main point the author is trying to convey regarding the importance of good password policy?
Answer A: a. Good password policy is the most important part of a secure system.
Answer B: b. A good password policy is as important as antivirus software.
Answer C: c. Good password policy can make the difference between a secure system and an insecure one.
Answer D: d. Good password policy is essential for protecting sensitive data.
Correct Answer: d. Good password policy is essential for protecting sensitive data. - and the reason why it is correct: Good password policy is essential for protecting sensitive data.
